newsitem.title: UK: Storehouse advances on bullish sales news.
newsitem.headline: Storehouse advances on bullish sales news.

text.p: Storehouse Plc shares rose 12p to 228-1/2p on Thursday, after news that sales rose strongly in the eight weeks running up to May 17.
The shares were also the most heavily traded in pre-market activity with nearly 1.5 million changing hands.
The trading statement, saying total sales were 15.5 percent ahead of the same period last year, came with the group's yearly results showing a nine percent profits rise.
"It's the statement that's really pushed them ahead," said one retail analyst.
Pre-tax, pre-exceptional profits for the year to March 30 rose to 118.3 million stg from 108.7 million last year against forecasts of 117.5 and 121 million.
